original_body_lines: Sri Lankan singer, musician, music director, composer, and playback singer Sanath Nandasiri passed away this morning

The President of the Sri Lanka Singers' Association Janaka Wickramasinghe told the Daily Mirror that Nandasiri passed away at his residence due to severe illness. He said Funeral arrangements would be announced later.
Nandasiri was the Chancellor of the University of the Visual and Performing Arts in Sri Lanka.
